title: Interpretation of dreams: I traveled to Kuwait in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream that I traveled to Kuwait in a dream.Interpretation of dreams that I traveled to Kuwait in a dreamInterpretation of dreams that I traveled to Kuwait in a dream could be a sign of the fulfillment of desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, as it may indicate the fulfillment of some desires for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen, in the event that the dreamer sees himself traveling to Kuwait This may indicate that he is relieved of tension, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl traveling to Kuwait in a dream, this may represent getting rid of problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream that I traveled to China in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I traveled to China in a dream, it could be a sign of... Kindness and livelihood, and God knows everything that is not seen, as he can express the good changes in his money and financial situation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees herself traveling to China in a dream, this may represent material changes for the better, and God knows best. If a young man sees himself traveling to China in a dream, This may be a sign of sustenance, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream: I travel to Sudan in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: I travel to Sudan in a dream, it could be a sign of nourishment, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself traveling to Sudan in a dream, he can express justice and piety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If A married woman was seen traveling in Sudan. She may look good, God willing. If a divorced woman sees herself traveling to Sudan in a dream, this may indicate her good condition, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams is that I traveled to Palestine in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I traveled to Palestine in a dream could lead to religiosity, and God knows the unseen. If A married man saw himself traveling to Palestine in a dream, this may be evidence of a good condition, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a single girl traveling to Palestine in a dream, it may represent the dreamer’s faith, and God knows the unseen. If a young man is seen traveling in Palestine, he may be kept away from sin, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation Dreaming about traveling on foot in a dreamThe interpretation of dreaming about traveling on foot in a dream could be a sign of future prospects, as it may indicate ambition and a love of adventure, and God knows the unseen, while many scholars stated that seeing travel while walking can lead to religion, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, where it can It expresses the removal of important matters and preoccupation with what is not beneficial, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a trip to Sinai in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about traveling to Sinai in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing travel in a dream could be a sign of changes for the dreamer, and God knows best. The Unseen: If a married woman sees travel, then she may have goodness and sustenance, and God knows best. The Unseen: When she sees a married man, traveling may mean moving from one place to another, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams that I traveled to Germany in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I traveled to Germany in a dream could be evidence of the work being done. With it, and God knows best, it can express the money that the dreamer gets, God willing

title: Seeing a woman I know kissing me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a girl I know in a dream: If a free girl sees a tall woman you know kissing her in a dream, then this dream indicates the girl’s long life, and God knows best. But if the woman is fat in the dream, this means that the dreamer will hear good news in the coming period, God willing. Seeing an unmarried young man, woman Kissing him in a dream symbolizes that he will soon marry a girl with beautiful features, and God knows best. Seeing in a dream that this woman is not beautiful means that the dreamer will be exposed to many problems and disagreements. Interpretation of a dream about a woman I know about a man. If the student sees a woman smiling at him and he knows her, this vision means that he will Very successful in his studies. If an employee sees a woman smiling in a dream, this means that he will get a promotion in his workplace, and God knows best. If this vision is in a married woman’s dream, this indicates family stability and marital happiness, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees a woman in her dream She smiles at her. This dream is praiseworthy and symbolizes her close marriage to a good young man. Interpretation of seeing a married woman I know in a dream about a man. If the dreamer sees a naked woman in his sleep, this vision means that he will be exposed to a major financial crisis, and God Almighty knows best. If the sleeper dreams of a woman without her clothes, he will fail in his studies. Or he is facing a problem at work. This vision in the dreamer’s dream may indicate that he is doing bad deeds that are tempting to God and that he must get closer to his Lord. Seeing a woman without clothes in a dream symbolizes the anxiety and sadness that the dreamer will suffer from throughout his life. Interpretation of a veiled woman in a dream: If he sees a woman saying hello to a woman Knowing her means that he will hear good news in the near future. But if a girl sees a young man greeting her in a dream, this vision means that she will soon marry this young man, God willing. Greeting an old woman in a dream means that the dreamer will face many problems in his life. But if the dreamer greets his sister For a married woman in a dream, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon by God’s command. Seeing an old woman I know in a dream. If one sees an old woman chasing him in a dream, this means that he will be exposed to a great calamity and that God Almighty is All-Knowing. Seeing an old woman for the dreamer indicates the worries, sorrows, and problems that he suffers from. The owner of the dream. If this old woman is ugly in appearance, then this vision shows that the fortuneteller is not on the right path, and that God Almighty. Seeing a married man, an old woman, in a dream, symbolizes marital unhappiness, and family instability, and God knows best. The unseen. A famous woman in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees a famous woman in her dream, then this vision means that she will marry the young man she loves. If this beautiful woman is in the dream of an unmarried woman, it means that she and her family will live a happy life, God willing. But if the girl This woman is known, this indicates that she will have a bright future and will achieve great success. Seeing a famous woman, but her clothes are inconsistent, this look is not good and shows consequences and judgments, by God.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cooked meat

preview.html: The degree of doneness of meat usually indicates the type of meat and the color of the inside. Many people dream of cooked meat. Therefore, they seek to know its interpretation, and fortunately, through this article, you will learn about the interpretation of seeing cooked meat in a dream in detail, so follow us. Seeing meat in dreams Many interpreters say that dreaming of raw meat is a bad omen, as it indicates disasters and misfortunes that will occur in the future and your inability to achieve your dreams. , because there are obstacles that prevent this, and if the meat is like that. This indicates that the owner of this dream will finally achieve his dream. Seeing cooked meat in a dream Seeing cooked meat in a dream shows your beauty and strength, you should be more able to develop your strength and it also shows that at the same time you are facing a challenge that you are trying to overcome by participating in the way you live In your life, since the vision you dream of cooked meat represents the feeling that you are trapped because of a problem that is weighing on you, making you feel very angry, you need to develop a strong plan to overcome your opponents, even if you face some losses, the meat in this dream is evidence of your desire. In helping others because you are in a bad emotional state. Interpretation of seeing cooked meat in a dream: Your dream of cooking meat in a dream is evidence that you have tremendous power, but you are using it incorrectly. It also shows your ability to adapt to all situations and circumstances that you may be exposed to, and that you seek to know the truth of things in every situation. Costs, and to do this, you must have a sufficient amount. Freedom to know everything easily, and seeing that you are cooking meat is evidence of realizing the power within you, so the dream symbolizes that you are keeping this power so that you can use it point correctly. To dream of meat cooked in The dream indicates an instinct inside you. Your vision of cooked meat in a dream may be just a sign of a frozen instinct inside you and that you are going through a difficult time. You also feel that you cannot tolerate the people around you because someone close to you has betrayed you. Seeing yourself eating fried meat in a dreamIf you eat fried meat in In a dream, it means that you are a person who depends on others in your life, you always say yes to what others say and you are afraid to take on your responsibilities. Dreaming of buying meat Buying meat in a dream is a symbol of good luck that you will have in the coming days and you will receive a very big reward from a rich man. Reasons Dreaming of eating cooked meatThere are many interpretations of eating cooked meat in a dream, which we will present below: Your expectation of a new future: Eating cooked meat in a dream is an expectation of a wonderful future through which you will earn a lot of money in your work. Promotion at work: Eating a piece of cooked meat promises In a dream, it is a positive sign that you will rise to the top at work through your promotion. Finally, we all know all the meanings and interpretations involved in the interpretation of seeing cooked meat in a dream.

title: Interpretation of the dream of obesity appearing in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Dream interpretation of the appearance of obesity in a dream, the symbol of municipal obesity in a dream for single, married and pregnant women, the meaning of obesity and yellow butter, signs of buying obesity, visions of white mistletoe, obesity is an essence extracted from milk and cream, including cow, buffalo and sheep ghee and is used for cooking purposes, and many people dream of it. By cooking with ghee or eating ghee and honey in a dream, and they do not find a suitable explanation for that. We will learn about the interpretation of seeing obesity in a dream according to what has been detailed in dream books. Interpretation of a dream about obesity by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of a dream about obesity in a dream, as mentioned by the great Arab scholar Ibn Sirin as evidence of science, knowledge, culture and religious jurisprudence. Seeing yellow cow ghee in a dream indicates To serious illness, exhaustion, exhaustion, and sadness behind me. As for seeing white buffalo mistletoe in your dream, it is evidence of kindness, a means of livelihood, kindness, marriage, and profit. Seeing yourself eating fat in a dream is evidence of success in achieving ambitions and fulfilling ambitions. Dreaming of eating fat and honey in a dream is evidence of earning Widespread livelihood, an increase in money, and a large number of business profits. The interpretation of seeing yourself eating fat and bread in a dream is recovery from illness, joy after sadness, consolation after distress, and wealth after poverty. The interpretation of a dream about failure of municipal obesity in a dream is evidence that you will soon obtain a lot Of money through inheritance. Interpretation of a dream about obesity by Al-Nabulsi: The interpretation of seeing new and local obesity in a dream is an indication of the ability to live close to relief and increase halal money. A dream about pouring fat in a dream indicates that you will lose a lot of money and lose in trade if The viewer is a merchant. Seeing unpleasant obesity in a dream is undesirable, because it indicates financial hardship, loss, and failure. Interpretation of a dream about obesity for a single woman: Seeing obesity in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of connection and marriage near a good person who fears God, appreciates him, and cares for him. The interpretation of the dream that she is eating a piece of lard in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence of her righteousness, the purity of her heart, and the purity of her soul. The interpretation of seeing delicious fat in a dream for a single woman is evidence that joy and happiness will come to them and they will live in a stable period, free of stress and sadness. But if If obesity in an unmarried woman’s dream is not appetizing, this is evidence that she will enter into an unsuccessful communication relationship, which will cause her sadness. The dream of light and liquid obesity in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that things have stopped and that there are many problems and obstacles in her life. Interpretation of a dream about fat for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about cooking fat and preparing it in a dream for a married woman is a sign of wealth, ample living, and an increase in money, which is good for her and her family. Interpretation of a dream about selling fat for a married woman as evidence that she will get her own money, but it is small. A married woman seeing her mother’s obesity in her dream is evidence of many problems and differences with her husband.Dream

title: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream through the Vision roy2a.com website. Watermelon is a delicious summer fruit that many people love. Seeing a watermelon in a dream has many meanings. Seeing a watermelon can be a good sign or an omen. Interpreters differed in their interpretation of seeing a watermelon. In a dream, according to the size and color of the watermelon, and depending on the condition and circumstances of the seer, and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant today, through the vision site, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for Ibn Sirin: Seeing a lot of watermelons in the dreamer's house indicates the coming death of one of the members of this house, and God knows best. Seeing a green or fresh watermelon in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys a life full of health and is not exposed to incurable diseases. Seeing a watermelon in a dream indicates a strong emotional relationship between him and the person he loves. Seeing yourself eating watermelon seeds in a dream indicates the son who is wronged by his family. See also: Interpretation of seeing orange peel, watermelon or eggs in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream by Nabulsi: Seeing a man with a watermelon in a dream indicates the problems he is going through and that have plagued his life. Seeing a watermelon in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through many problems And the obstacles that do not know when to end. Seeing yourself eating watermelon in a dream indicates the death of crises, worries and difficulties from the dreamer's life. What is the interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for Ibn Shaheen: Seeing watermelon in a dream indicates that the dreamer will soon be afflicted with a disease, God knows best. Seeing a green watermelon in a dream shows a lot of money that the dreamer will get. Seeing yourself eating a green watermelon in a dream indicates the end of sadness, distress and judgments from the dreamer's life. See also: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single watermelon in a dream indicates that he will get married soon. Seeing a watermelon for an unmarried woman in its season in a dream indicates the success and good luck that will accompany her in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman eating watermelon in a dream It shows many good things that she will soon accept. Seeing a single woman eating watermelon out of season in a dream shows many bad things that will happen to her soon. Seeing a large watermelon in a dream for a single woman shows that the person she marries will be of great importance. See also: Interpretation of seeing bananas in Dream What is the interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman eating a watermelon in a dream indicates that she will get a lot of money. Seeing a married woman eating a watermelon in a dream indicates that God will bless her with a child soon. Seeing a married woman eating a watermelon in a dream indicates the release of worries and sorrows and the release of obstacles in the coming period. Seeing a yellow married woman eating a watermelon in a dream indicates a beautiful woman who cares about her elegance. Seeing a married woman eating a watermelon in a dream indicates that God will bless her with a child soon.

title: What is the interpretation of tigers in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Tigers in dreams, the interpreters said that the dream carries many interpretations that differ depending on the details of the dream and the dreamer’s feelings, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing tigers for single, pregnant and married women and men, according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. The tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The tiger in a dream: seeing tigers In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer is characterized by boldness and a strong personality, and the interpretation of a dream about tigers shows that the dreamer is an ambitious person who is trying with all his might to achieve his goals. If the visionary sees tigers in a dream and feels fear, then he hears sad news related to someone, his family members, or his friends during the period Next.Getting injured by tigers in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will soon be deceived by someone he trusts, so he should be careful. Seeing a tiger approaching a fortuneteller is a sign of the presence of a competitor at work who hates him and wants to kill him. He has left work, and if the visionary sees himself riding on the back of tigers in a dream, this means that he will occupy an important position in his professional life very soon. The tiger in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that Seeing tigers is a sign of success in practical life and the fulfillment of ambitions, and tigers in a dream indicate that he will soon find a new enemy because of his repeated mistakes and inappropriate behavior. As for the tiger that attacks the dreamer in a dream, it symbolizes the presence of an evil friend who is jealous of him and has hatred towards him. He pays attention to it and strengthens himself by reciting the Holy Qur’an. Plot.A tiger in a dream for a single woman. title: Interpretation of seeing yourself singing in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: What does it mean to see yourself singing? It symbolizes a great misfortune that the dreamer suffers from. What does it mean for a married woman to sing and dance? It indicates her bad behavior. What is the interpretation of seeing music? Follow superstitions and live in illusions. What does it mean for a married woman who sings with a beautiful voice? Expresses About the feeling of joy and happiness. What is the purpose of listening to patriotic songs? It shows that she and her family feel satisfied and happy. What does it mean to sing in a clear voice? A sign of high morale. Interpretation of seeing yourself singing in a dream by Ibn Sirincher. Seeing the song in a dream is a great misfortune that the dreamer has suffered from. The vision warns of To go in the wrong path, and God knows best. Hearing a song with a beautiful voice in a dream from a merchant is good news about the acquisition of great spoils. If the sound is annoying, the vision warns of wasting a lot of money. The vision also warns the rich person of a scandal that will befall him and his family. The dream of a person who is going through financial hardship symbolizes He will be crazy, and God knows best. The dreamer who stands in one place and starts singing in a dream indicates the person who comes between him and his friends and spoils their relationship. The vision indicates quarrels that the dreamer is going through. Listening to music in a dream is a sign that you are following superstitions and living in illusions. The dream indicates committing great sins, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing singing about Nabulsi: Seeing a song on the road is a sign of joy and happiness. If a person sees that he is singing in the market, this indicates unhappy events. A dream about participating in singing competitions is evidence of recklessness and Unpleasant visions. Interpretation of a dream about singing with a beautiful voice for a married woman. A married woman sings with a beautiful voice in a dream, a sign of happiness and joy. The vision symbolizes the strength of the woman and her ability to bear the responsibility of the family, as well as her attempt to ease the burdens on her husband. If the voice is bad in the dream, then the dream indicates However, the woman evades responsibility and neglects her husband and does not fulfill her duties towards her family. Seeing a young man singing with a beautiful and sweet voice indicates an increase in blessings and goodness in the woman’s life. If his voice is disturbed, the vision warns of the crises that she is going through. The previous vision shows the woman’s need for help in Overcoming crises in order to provide for her family. Hearing patriotic songs in a dream means that she and her family will feel satisfied and happy. While watching romantic songs symbolizes the fall of tension and psychological pressures and a calmer and more stable period. Religious songs in a dream It symbolizes a woman’s religiosity and her constant striving to get closer to God through... Performing tasks and seeking forgiveness. The novel also deals with a woman’s preservation of her reputation and the reputation of her husband and children. Interpretation of a dream about singing in front of people. If the dreamer sees that he is singing in a dream in front of people in a dream, this indicates that he will be the cause of unrest among them. Singing individually in front of people with a beautiful voice in front of people has been well received. Great, as the novel suggests making a lot of effort to reach the success you want. The vision also heralds the distinction of the dreamer’s success and his ability to prove himself.

title: Interpretation of seeing a beggar in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone approaching in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the vision website Roy2a.com. It could be a warning or warning of the appearance of evil, and interpreters differed in interpreting seeing a person fading, whether she is a single woman, married, pregnant woman, or divorced with different concepts. from. Today, through the Roya website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a person vanish in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing Shehata in a dream? If someone sees in his dream That someone is asking him for money and giving it to him, this is evidence of the end of the dreamer’s problems and the collapse of his worries. Seeing beetles in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will face many crises and problems in his life. If a married man dreams that he is sitting next to a shy person, this is evidence of poverty and lack of money and means of livelihood. The dream of marrying a stingy man in the dream of an unmarried girl is a symbol of a lack of kindness, tenderness and love. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lot of money in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about Shehata in a dream? Jurists interpreted that seeing Shehata in a dream is an unpleasant vision. Seeing someone losing weight in a dream is a sign of poverty. And the lack of money coming to the divine. The dream of seeing many beggars in a dream is a symbol of the spread of epidemic and disease among people. Seeing a beetle in a dream indicates the need for tenderness and love. See also: Interpretation of a dream about papers, metal, silver, or counterfeit money. What is the interpretation of a dream about hitting a beggar? If Someone dreams that he is beating a beggar, then this is a sign of the hardness and injustice of his heart. Dreaming of seeing someone the dreamer knows is begging and the dreamer is hitting him, this is evidence of the priest’s injustice to that person. Seeing someone asking the fortuneteller for money and beating him is evidence of the appearance of problems, worries, and poverty for the Lord. See also: Interpretation of seeing a wallet in a dream. A beggar in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing a beggar in a dream and giving him money is a sign of the end of sorrows and troubles in the life of the dreamer. A dream of seeing the same person or someone he knows begging is a sign of accumulating debts. Seeing a beggar or a beggar in a dream is a sign of instability, comfort, and psychological damage. What is the interpretation of begging in a dream for a man? Seeing a man Begging in a dream is a sign of bad luck and recurring problems. A person’s dream of begging or begging in his sleep is evidence of a tight situation and many psychological problems. If a person dreams that he is begging, this is evidence of his poverty and increasing debts. A man’s dream of begging in a dream is a symbol of losing money. See also: Interpretation Seeing a slice in a dream What is the meaning of a beggar or a beggar in a dream? Seeing a beggar in a dream is a sign of poverty, loss of money, and many crises in the life of the fortuneteller. A dream about begging or begging in a dream is a symbol of the dreamer’s weakness and laziness. We are pleased on the site to see your dream coming down to “Interpretation of seeing someone losing in “Dream” through comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing the color violet in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website offers you the interpretation of seeing a purple dream. And the visions and languages ​​of translation experts, as we have compiled a vision of the color purple for elderly and married women and everything related to the color purple. For example, why do you dream of a purple dress in a dream for a pregnant woman? You just have to follow the article. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing purpleWhy dream of seeing the color purple in a dream is complete evidence of pride, greatness, sublimity, and wonderful work. Seeing the color purple in a dream indicates the dreamer’s wealth, wealth, and a life full of luxury. The color purple in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve Many desires, goals, and good deeds. Seeing the color purple in a dream speaks of a good deed and that the dreamer has attained a prominent position in society. The completion of the purple color in the dream. The interpretation of seeing purple clothes in a dream is a sign of friends and loyal people in the dreamer’s life. Dr. Al-Osaimi saw Purple color in a full dream, he said that this is always the end of something and a change in circumstances, and in some cases it is the end of the period. Seeing the purple color for lonely people. Wearing a purple dress for a public woman in a full dream means happiness, joy, and improving the psychological state. Purple shoes in a public dream for a woman indicate Her marriage is approaching and she will enter a new home full of love and affection. Why does a single woman dream of light purple? It indicates sincere feelings and love on the part of the person. Purple hair in a married woman’s dream. The complete interpretation of seeing the color purple in a dream for a married woman as a whole is evidence of comfort, stability and peace. Seeing purple shoes in a dream is full of happiness and joy, as well as the fact that she and her family will have enough livelihood. Why dream of a purple dress for a pregnant womanSeeing a full purple dress for a pregnant woman in a dream is good news and evidence of an easy and affordable birth. Purple color in a dream full For a pregnant woman, it is an excellent indicator of support, abundant kindness, comfort, and stability. Seeing the color purple in a woman’s home in a dream indicates happy changes that will occur in her life. Why does a man dream of purple? The interpretation of seeing the color full of purple in a dream for a man indicates success, success, and success in Life. Wearing purple clothes for a man in a dream fully indicates the presence of loyal friends by his side. The color purple in a dream indicates fame and money, and also indicates strength, intelligence, and a cheerful disposition. title: Interpretation of the palace in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the palace in a dream, for single people, married people, pregnant women, divorced women, or entering through the large, wide door of the palace. I dreamed that I was staying in the king’s palace and more than that. Interpretation of the palace in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams that seeing a palace in a dream It portends high status, status, and money. If one dreams that he enters a palace or that he has a palace in his dream, its benefit is near. For him, if the person is known and is generally good (the palace) in a dream that the immoral person has imprisonment, hardship, and a lack of money and prestige, and what is hidden for him is that the matter will be lifted and the debt paid. (And whoever dreams) that he entered a palace, he will become a great ruler, improve his religion, and become better than what is in his hand. (And whoever dreams) that he is standing in a palace, and if the palace is his, then that will bring him superiority, majesty, and power. He marries someone whose companionship does not last, and the palace in the city is large and luxurious, with rooms and halls. (And whoever dreams) that in one of the palaces of Paradise he achieved leadership and victory over his enemy or married a beautiful maid. The palace is interpreted in different ways. Whoever sees that he enters a palace, it indicates the acquisition of grace and money. , especially if the palace was built of bricks and bricks, and if it was made of plaster and stone, this indicates this. The appearance of money, corruption in religion, and the display of sadness on the part of the king. Interpretation of the palace in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. If you wander in a dream in a palace or admire its grandeur, this portends an increase in your abilities and good reputation, and you will attain a prominent position. If you see and hear beautiful men and women talking and dancing in a palace, this portends That you are involved in a new, useful and happy company. If a middle-class girl dreams that she is participating in a party with members of her class in a palace, this portends that she is about to get married and that the relatives will be generous and kind to her. For a girl who comes from a humble background, this dream is confusing It lacks clarity, as her lazy mind is filled with trivial daydreams. If she sees this dream, she must begin serious and worthy work and curb her delusional ambitions by resorting to the advice of her mother and friends. If you dream that you are in a palace with a room haunted by ghosts, this foretells that your coming days will bring you bad Luck and disappointment. If you dream that you are in a large palace, this portends success in the coming days and your wealth. If you dream of a palace that you see from afar, this foretells success in your future. Seeing being in a palace denotes prosperity, success, and protection, as well as short-term pleasures. Living in a palace In a dream, it indicates sadness and depression. Not entering the palace in a dream indicates setbacks and deterioration in something. If you see yourself building a palace, this means that your ambition will be in the interests of your enemies. Seeing a destroyed palace in a dream indicates fears and problems. Seeing a palace in a dream indicates the presence of envious people in your environment. Any person Seeing that they inherited the Al-Fahd Palace indicates that they are going through a difficult time. Visiting the palace in a dream means a positive change in your life, and if he enters the palace single, he will get married. Interpretation of the palace in a dream of an unmarried woman. Seeing the palace in a dream of an unmarried girl means goodness and many surprises.
